creditCardMessage: {{name}}'s {{cardType}} ending with {{lastFourDigitCardNo}} was used to complete this transaction, which will appear on your credit card statement as "CHARITABLE IMPACT FDN * DONATION".
recurringCreditCardMessage: {{name}}'s {{cardType}} ending with {{lastFourDigitCardNo}} will be charged {{amount}} on the {{recurringDay}} of each month, starting on {{recurringDate}}.
quaziDonationMessageForAllocations: Apologies,{{name}}. To send your gift,please wait for a confirmation email from us.
quaziDonationSuccessMessage: Thank you, {{name}}. We're processing your transaction and will add {{amount}} to your CHARITABLE IMPACT Account shortly.
quaziDonationSuccessMessageTwo: We'll send you an email within 24 hours confirming that the amount has been added.
quaziSuccessSecondMessageforAllocation: It's taking us a little longer than expected to process the {{amount}} top up that's needed to send your gift. We're still working on it and will send you an email within 24 hours confirming that the amount has been added to your CHARITABLE IMPACT Account.
quaziSuccessThirdMessageforAllocation: When you get the email from us, please come back to your CHARITABLE IMPACT Account to send your gift to {{recipient}}.
companyAddMoney: Nicely done, {{name}}. You added {{amount}} to the {{companyName}} CHARITABLE IMPACT Account.
addMoney: Nicely done, {{name}}. You added {{amount}} to your CHARITABLE IMPACT Account.
userSingleCoverFeesAllocation: Thank you, {{name}}. You gave {{amount}} (plus {{coverFeesAmount}} in covered third-party processing fees) to {{to}}.
nonUserSingleCoverFeesAllocation: Thank you, {{name}}. You gave {{amount}} (plus {{coverFeesAmount}} in fees) from {{fromName}}'s CHARITABLE IMPACT Account to {{to}}.
nonUserSingleAllocation: Thank you, {{name}}. You gave {{amount}} from {{fromName}}'s CHARITABLE IMPACT Account to {{to}}.
fromToMultipleRecipient: Nice work, {{name}}. You gave {{number}} gifts of {{amount}} for a total of {{total}} sent.
nonrecurringCCAllocationDetails: {{creditCard}} was used to complete this transaction, which will appear on the credit card statement as "CHARITABLE IMPACT FDN * DONATION".
nonrecurringDonationDetails: In addition, {{amount}} was matched by {{matchingParty}} and added to {{to}}'s CHARITABLE IMPACT Account.
timeForSendingCharity: Your gift will be sent to the recipient on {{month}}.
userRecurringAllocation: Thank you, {{name}}. You scheduled a monthly gift of {{amount}} to go to {{to}}.
nonUserRecurringAllocation: Thank you, {{name}}. You scheduled a monthly gift of {{amount}} by {{fromName}} to {{to}}.
recurringAllocationDetails: This gift will be made from {{fromName}}'s CHARITABLE IMPACT Account on the {{dayOfMonth}} of each month, starting on {{startsOn}}.
recurringAllocationNotes: If there isn't enough money in this CHARITABLE IMPACT Account to cover the gift, we'll charge {{creditCard}}. A new tax receipt will be issued and the charge will appear on the credit card statement as "CHARITABLE IMPACT FDN * DONATION".
companyRecurringDonation: Nicely done, {{name}}. You now added {{amount}} to the {{companyName}} CHARITABLE IMPACT Account each month.
companyRecurringTaxReceiptMessage: Each time, a tax receipt will be automatically posted to the {{companyName}} CHARITABLE IMPACT Account and the transaction will appear on the credit card statement as "CHARITABLE IMPACT FDN * DONATION".
recurringDonation: Nicely done, {{name}}. You scheduled {{amount}} to be added to your CHARITABLE IMPACT Account each month.
recurringTaxReceiptMessage: Each time, a tax receipt will automatically be posted to your CHARITABLE IMPACT Account and the transaction will appear on your credit card statement as "CHARITABLE IMPACT FDN * DONATION".
